categories.label: Logic & Control Flow
categories.description: Delays, conditions, loops, transforms ‚Äî the backbone of every workflow.

categories.label: Everyday Tools
categories.description: The tools you already use every day.

services.name: Delay
services.description_short: Pause workflow execution for a set duration.
services.description_long: Add timed delays between workflow steps. Wait a fixed duration, wait until a specific time, or add a random jitter delay for natural-feeling automation sequences.

tools.name: Wait
tools.description: Pause for a fixed duration (seconds, minutes, hours, days).

tools.name: Random Delay
tools.description: Pause for a random duration within a range.

services.name: Schedule
services.description_short: Run workflows on cron schedules or at specific times.
services.description_long: Schedule workflow execution using cron expressions, recurring intervals, one-time runs, or business-hours-only windows.

tools.name: Cron Schedule
tools.description: Run on a cron schedule (e.g. '0 9 * * MON-FRI').

tools.name: Run Once At
tools.description: Run once at a specific date/time.

services.name: If / Else
services.description_short: Branch workflows based on conditions.
services.description_long: Route workflow execution through different paths using if/else conditions, switch/case branching, data existence checks, value comparisons, and human-in-the-loop approval gates.

tools.name: If / Else
tools.description: Branch based on a true/false condition.

tools.name: Switch / Case
tools.description: Branch to one of many paths based on a value.

tools.name: Data Exists
tools.description: Check if a value is present/non-empty.

tools.name: Compare Values
tools.description: Compare two values (equals, greater, less, contains).

tools.name: Gate / Approval
tools.description: Pause until manual approval or a condition is met.

services.name: Loop
services.description_short: Iterate over arrays or repeat until a condition.
services.description_long: Process arrays item-by-item, repeat actions until a condition is met, batch items into groups, or fan out parallel executions.

tools.name: For Each
tools.description: Iterate over each item in an array.

tools.name: While Loop
tools.description: Repeat while a condition is true.

tools.name: Batch Process
tools.description: Process items in batches of N.

tools.name: Parallel For Each
tools.description: Fan out: process all items simultaneously.

services.name: Transform
services.description_short: Reshape, filter, and compute data between steps.
services.description_long: Map fields between schemas, filter arrays, merge objects, extract nested values, format text with templates, and compute new values from expressions.

tools.name: Map Fields
tools.description: Map/rename fields from one schema to another.

tools.name: Filter Array
tools.description: Keep only items matching a condition.

tools.name: Extract Value
tools.description: Extract a value from a nested path.

tools.name: Format Text
tools.description: Build a string from a template with variables.

tools.name: Compute
tools.description: Evaluate a math or logic expression.

services.name: Trigger
services.description_short: Define how a workflow starts.
services.description_long: Trigger workflows via incoming webhooks, manual execution, event listeners from connected services, or form submissions.

tools.name: Webhook Trigger
tools.description: Start workflow when an HTTP request is received.

tools.name: Manual Trigger
tools.description: Start workflow on demand (button click / API call).

tools.name: Event Listener
tools.description: Start workflow when a service emits an event.

tools.name: Form Submission
tools.description: Start workflow when a form is submitted.

services.name: Error Handling
services.description_short: Handle failures gracefully in workflows.
services.description_long: Wrap steps in try/catch blocks, retry with exponential backoff, send error alerts, or stop the entire workflow on critical failures.

tools.name: Try / Catch
tools.description: Wrap a step and catch failures.

tools.name: Retry with Backoff
tools.description: Retry a failed step with exponential backoff.

tools.name: Error Alert
tools.description: Send a notification when an error occurs.
